item.title: Data General/Acer 6312-k
item.description: History This keyboard was made by Acer and it uses Acer’s patented switch-over-membrane design. Acer had produced various models in this series, and this particular model is for Data general. Acer 6312-k back PCB Build and Features I have acquired this New old stock keyboard from eBay for a very reasonable price. The keyboard isn’t too heavy despite its large footprint. However, the board is built very well and doesn’t creak, unlike other cheap boards.
